inclusion.criterion: Patient with any form of shock on admission to ICU
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patient has a positive sputum culture for Mycobacterium tuberculosis
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Chronic liver failure( Child's B grade and above)
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patients who were already recruited for this study
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patients expected to die within next 48 hrs upon admission
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has a positive sputum culture for Mycobacterium tuberculosis, but no other exclusion criteria are met.
